Contract Audit, Contract Negotiation Support, and NSA Dispute Arbitration from Experts

In Liminal Health, we offer:

  • A higher win rate and fewer dropped claims with the optimized NSA arbitration process
  • Better contract rates based on a payer's own self-reported price transparency data
  • More profitable contracts based on analysis of high- or low-profit service areas
What we do

NSA DISPUTES MANAGEMENT

Recover More Revenue in NSA IDR Disputes Effectively and at the Lower Cost

Our fully customizable and scalable cloud-based solution enables processing of any number of disputes in the NSA Independent Dispute Resolution process and allows for making rapid process changes at a lower cost.

CHALLENGE

Managing the constantly increasing number of NSA IDR disputes is a time-consuming task that requires extensive manual labor.

Losing sight of progress on disputes can result in errors and delays, which in turn can lead to lost or canceled disputes and negatively impact revenue.

SOLUTION

The NSA Disputes Management solution introduces transparency to the dispute lifecycle by allowing the users to track and manage the status of every dispute and its progress at each stage of processing, and take timely action when necessary.

It also gives instant access to all related documents and dashboards.

DIFFERENTIATORS

What Makes Us Different?

Our experience in NSA legal support and automation projects across multiple clients has provided us with an understanding of common pitfalls and success strategies leading to won disputes.

We design our NSA arbitration offers and supporting materials with legal understanding, a history of wins and losses, and FAIRHealth and Price Transparency datasets at hand.
